Posted By: Gabriel422 (9/23/2011 12:58:26 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
That art is so creepy. You can see the hands of the kids reaching out of the bag trying to grip the ground. So they don't appear dead yet, just stuffed in a burlap bag and dragged through the woods.   
  
Raises a good point though, why is it fine for adults to be shown massacred (see many other cards in this set and almost every MtG set) yet they rarely show children like this for that reason. Why is it so much more disturbing for us?
posts.html:

posts.post_content: @OmegaSerris FCC rules and regulations stipulate that there is no violence shown towards children in child-accessible media (i.e. videogames and most TV shows). violence may be suggested, but not shown or allowed directly. that's why you only see children in noncombat areas in most videogames, and why you never see outright violence towards them in magic or other places.
posts.html:
